editor.label: Application Server - IIS6 StopServer
editor.description: This procedure uses the iisreset utility to stop a server.

formElement.label: Configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the configuration that holds connection information for the IIS server.

formElement.label: Absolute location of the iisreset utility:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute path of the script utility used to execute this step (i.e: iisreset or c:/windows/system32/iisreset.exe).
